subject: Fedor live cd
body:
Glen, I retract what I said earlier.  Apparently, there is a live Fedora 
cd.
I saw a reference to it in a message from Janina from about 3 weeks ago. 
For more information I guess you'll have to ask her.

      Jim Wantz
